title: Problem Solvers Co-Chairs Reed & Gottheimer

description:
Guests: Bloomberg contributors Jeanne Zaino, Iona College professor and Rick Davis, Partner at Stone Court Capital, and former campaign manager for John McCain's 2008 presidential campaign, and Problem Solvers Co-chairs, Josh Gottheimer, a Democrat representing New Jersey's 5th congressional district and Tom Reed, a Republican representing New York's 23rd congression
